T02D3757:106b-1: ma h'a bo dhi audde sha n'a ma /
T02D3757:106b-3: byang chub chen po mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba /
T02D3757:106b-4: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3757:106b-5: dpal ldan byang chub chen po 'phags pa'i gnas rnams gtam du bya ba ni //
T02D3757:106b-6: bcom ldan 'das mngon par sangs rgyas nas nyin zhag
T02D3757:107a-0: bdun phrag dang po la byang chub kyi drung @107a
T02D3757:107a-2: / gnyis pa la byang chub kyi shing la spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs so //
T02D3757:107a-4: bzhi pa la byang chub kyi drung du'o //
T02D3757:107a-5: kha cig ni rin po che'i khang par zer ro //
T02D3757:107a-6: lnga pa la rgyal po'i 'byung gnas su'o //
T02D3757:107a-7: drug pa la klu btang bzung gi gnas su'o ;
T02D3757:107a-8: / bdun pa la ra skyong gi nya gro dha'i gnas su'o //
T02D3757:107a-9: byang chub chen po'i dri gtsang khang dang nye bar
T02D3757:107a-10: rdo'i lcags ri ra ba bdun gyi khor yug gis
T02D3757:107a-11: bskor ba / byang chub kyi shing bsrung ba'i don
T02D3757:107a-12: du 'brog dgon pa'i glang po che'i tshogs kyi gnod
T02D3757:107a-13: pa'i 'jigs pa las bsrung pa'i phyir stobs kyi 'khor
T02D3757:107a-14: los sgyur ba dpal ldan chos kyi mya ngan med
T02D3757:107a-15: bskor ba / kyis byas so // dpal ldan byang
T02D3757:107a-16: chub chen po'i dri gtsang khang dag pa'i gnas su
T02D3757:107a-17: lha'i bu bcu dgu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs
T02D3757:107a-18: brnyan la bltab par snang la gnas so //
T02D3757:107a-19: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing gtam du byed bzhugs so ;
T02D3757:107a-20: /'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dus ring mo nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya'o //
T02D3757:107a-21: sa ga zla ba'i nya gang ba la rgyu skar
T02D3757:107a-22: sa ga dang gza' mig dmar gyi dus su sangs
T02D3757:107a-23: rgyas pa nyid kyi nyin zhag la tshangs pa dang
T02D3757:107a-28: gnod sbyin la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
T02D3757:107a-29: pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pa las dngos grub
T02D3757:107a-30: tu 'gyur ro zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D3757:107a-31: de yang 'phags pa'i gnas kyi lcags ri'i lho sgor
T02D3757:107a-32: phyin pa na shar dang nub tu mchod rten gnyis
T02D3757:107a-33: so // de dag las nub kyi mchod rten ni
T02D3757:107a-34: chos kyi mya ngan med pa'i btsun mo'i tshogs kyi
T02D3757:107a-36: mchod rten gnyis pa ni lha skyong gi nang gi grong gi sbyin pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D3757:107a-37: dpal ldan chos kyi mya ngan med kyi bar ma
T02D3757:107a-38: chad du bram ze mtho btsun grub rjes byang chub
T02D3757:107a-39: chen po'i dri gtsang khang chen po byang chub chen
T02D3757:107a-40: po'i sku dang bcas pa bzhengs so //
T02D3757:107a-41: rje btsun zhabs dang bi shva ka rmas tsandan go sh'irsha las bsgrubs so zhes thos so //
T02D3757:107a-42: shar gyi mchod rten gyi rta babs las 'dod pa'i lha'i gdugs lhung ngo zhes gtam du byed do //
T02D3757:107a-43: byang chub kyi lhor dge ba'i 'byung gnas kyi mchod rten chen po'o //
T02D3757:107a-44: lho sgo'i shar ngos su chos kyi mya ngan med
T02D3757:107b-0: kyi rdo'i rang @107b bzhin gyi dgra bcom pa'i dri
T02D3757:107b-1: gtsang khang du bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D3757:107b-2: lam nyi ma dang zla ba'i mchod rten gnyis so
T02D3757:107b-3: // ra skyong gi n+ya gro dha'i drung du tshangs
T02D3757:107b-4: pa 'ongs shing bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyang 'ongs
T02D3757:107b-6: de'i bdun sar rdo'i mchod sdong gi mchod rten no //
T02D3757:107b-7: der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa la tshangs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab bo //
T02D3757:107b-8: rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i dbus su rdo rje phur bu'i mchod rten bzhi'o //
T02D3757:107b-9: byang chub kyi nub tu byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs
T02D3757:107b-10: te byang chub kyi shing la rnam par gzigs pa'i
T02D3757:107b-11: mchod rten no // aangg'a ra bo dhi'i gnas su aa shvattha'i shing ngo //
T02D3757:107b-12: de'i nub tu bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su zhal
T02D3757:107b-13: gzigs te 'od zer bkye ba'i dri gtsang khang du
T02D3757:107b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs sku tshad dang mnyam
T02D3757:107b-15: pa'o // de'i byang du sgrol ma ku ru ku lle'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:107b-16: de nas nub byang du bdud kyi bu lnga brgya
T02D3757:107b-17: po rnams sangs rgyas la rab tu dad pa'i mchod
T02D3757:107b-19: sangs rgyas la ma dad cing blo ngan pa lnga
T02D3757:107b-20: brgya'i tshogs ni shar phyogs kyi sgor 'dug pa rnams
T02D3757:107b-21: 'khor yug chen po'i nub byang gi mtshams nas 'dod
T02D3757:107b-22: pa'i lha byer bar gyur to //
T02D3757:107b-23: de nas shar du hu lu hu lu'i sgrol ma'o //
T02D3757:107b-24: de'i shar du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dri gtsang khang gi dbus su mchod rten zlum bu'o //
T02D3757:107b-25: spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs pa'i nub tu skye ba dran pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:107b-26: re'u mig gi sgo'i lho phyogs su gzhon nu zla ba'i dri gtsang khang ngo //
T02D3757:107b-27: khor yug chen po'i byang shar gyi mtshams su mchog sred kyi mchod rten gnyis so //
T02D3757:107b-28: shar phyogs su mchod rten gcig go //
T02D3757:107b-29: shar sgo dang nye bar sangs rgyas 'od srungs zhabs 'chags pa'i rdo'i mchod rten gnyis pa'o //
T02D3757:107b-30: seng ge'i sgo'i shar gyi ngos su seng ge'i lag pa'i chu sbyin pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:107b-31: de nas nub tu gzims pa la 'jug pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:107b-32: gzims pa la 'jug pa'i lhor dri za gtsug bud lnga pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:107b-33: de'i nub tu tshangs pa dang dbang po'i mchod rten gnyis so //
T02D3757:107b-34: klu'i rgyal po dus can gyi gnas kyi lho phyogs
T02D3757:107b-35: aa mra'i chal du dang po nas ting nge 'dzin
T02D3757:107b-36: skye ba'i mchod rten rnams so //
T02D3757:108a-0: de nas shar gyi phyogs chu klung nee ranydza na'i 'gram du byang chub sems dpa' @108a * //
T02D3757:108a-1: gnas dang gnas rnams su zhabs 'chags pa dang /
T02D3757:108a-2: ral pa can gyi gnas dang gnas rnams su gshegs pa'i mchod rten gnyis pa'o //
T02D3757:108a-3: chu klung gi shar phyogs la sogs pa'i dbye ba
T02D3757:108a-4: ni chu klung gi khyab pa nyid kyi rjes su
T02D3757:108a-6: de nas nub tu skyed mos tshal gyi dbus su
T02D3757:108a-7: dga' ma dang dga' stobs mas bsod snyoms phul ba'i
T02D3757:108a-8: mchod rten no // de nas lhor me tog phreng
T02D3757:108a-9: ba'i shar gyi ngos chu klung nee ranydza nar bcom
T02D3757:108a-10: ldan 'das khrus mdzad pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:108a-11: de nas nub tu zag pa 'dor ba rdo'i mchod stong gi mchod rten no //
T02D3757:108a-12: de'i lhor tsandan su b'i ra 'jug pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:108a-13: de nas shar lhor dka' ba spyod pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:108a-14: de'i byang ngos su 'dun pa byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:108a-15: dka' ba spyod pa'i byang ngos su tsandan su b'i
T02D3757:108a-16: ra dag gis rnam par rgyal ba bris pa'i mchod
T02D3757:108a-17: rten gnyis so // dka' ba spyod pa'i shar lhor
T02D3757:108a-18: chu klung gi 'gram du sangs rgyas 'khor dang thabs
T02D3757:108a-19: cig tu ral pa can rnams kyi gnas su bzhugs
T02D3757:108a-21: de nyid du tsandan su b'i ra dag dang thabs cig pa'i mchod rten gnyis so //
T02D3757:108a-22: de nas lhor lha dbyangs sgrogs pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:108a-23: de nas lhor ga gon dang bzang po'i don du mchod rten rnams so //
T02D3757:108a-24: de dag gi steng gi nam mkhar brgya byin gnas so zhes thos so //
T02D3757:108a-25: de nas lhor aa mra'i shing gi ngos rgyal po'i
T02D3757:108a-26: 'byung gnas kyi drung du nyi ma bdun pa'i mchod
T02D3757:108a-27: rten lnga'o // rgyal po'i 'byung gnas kyi gnas su 'o ma can gyi shing yod do //
T02D3757:108a-28: der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis bcom ldan 'das la
T02D3757:108a-29: lhung bzed bzhi phul ba gcig tu mdzad de longs
T02D3757:108a-30: spyod do // de nyid du ga gon dang bzang po dag gis zas phul lo //
T02D3757:108a-31: de nas shar phyogs chu klung nee ranydza na'i 'gram
T02D3757:108a-32: du ga gon dang zang po gnyis kyis bsod snyoms
T02D3757:108a-33: kyi zas phul ba'i mchod rten no ;
T02D3757:108a-34: / sangs rgyas nas zas gsol ba'i dang po'o //
T02D3757:108a-35: nee ranydza na'i shar phyogs glang po che'i gshangs su
T02D3757:108a-36: phyogs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang dbang po'o
T02D3757:108a-37: 'ongs te mchod rten lnga bzhengs so //
T02D3757:108a-38: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'ongs te phyogs bzhir mchod rten bzhengs so //
T02D3757:108b-0: shar phyogs su dbang po @108b 'ongs te mchod bzhengs so //
T02D3757:108b-1: de nas shar gyi phyogs su byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3757:108b-2: yum gyis gso ba yum gyi mngal gyi mchod rten
T02D3757:108b-3: no // de la bram ze mtho btsun grub rjes
T02D3757:108b-4: dpal ldan byang chub chen po bzhengs par 'dod pa
T02D3757:108b-5: no // la / lhas lung bstan pa nee ranydza
T02D3757:108b-6: na'i 'gram na tsandan go shirsha yod pa las sgrubs
T02D3757:108b-8: so ga'i dus su ma he mang po bye ma'i
T02D3757:108b-9: steng du nyi ma re re zhing 'dug pa mthong
T02D3757:108b-10: nas de bsil ba'i gnas su 'dug pa la dpags
T02D3757:108b-11: te btsal bas rnyed de de gnas de nas phyung
T02D3757:108b-12: ste tsandan go shirsha de nyid las rje btsun gyi
T02D3757:108b-13: sku bzhengs so // klu btang bzung gi gnas su
T02D3757:108b-14: nyi ma bdun pa'i dri gtsang khang du klu btang
T02D3757:108b-15: bzung gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal ba'i mchod
T02D3757:108b-16: sku bzhengs so // rten no // klu btang bzung
T02D3757:108b-17: gi lho ngos su ra skyong gi lha'i bu mtho
T02D3757:108b-18: ris nas babs pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:108b-19: btang bzung gi gnas byang ngos su ra skyong gi
T02D3757:108b-20: lha'i bu nya gro dha 'dul ba'i mchod rten gsum
T02D3757:108b-21: mo // brgya byin mtsho'i lho phyogs su sh'u tsi'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:108b-22: 'dir dus 'ga' zhig gi tshe dge bsnyen ma zhig
T02D3757:108b-23: la bu bcu yod pa de dag thams cad kyang
T02D3757:108b-24: rab tu byung nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
T02D3757:108b-26: ji tsam na de rnams la ma rgan mos sha
T02D3757:108b-27: na'i gos dag cig bying pa dang de rnams kyis
T02D3757:108b-28: rmas pa / bdag cag la dgos pa med kyi
T02D3757:108b-29: rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras gzhon nu don thams
T02D3757:108b-30: cad grub pa zhes bya ba rga ba dang na
T02D3757:108b-31: ba dang 'chi ba mthong nas skyo ba'i yod kyis
T02D3757:108b-32: ngas su song nas bla na med pa yang dag
T02D3757:108b-33: pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes par 'gyur gyi de
T02D3757:108b-34: dag la phul cig ces lung bstan nas ;
T02D3757:108b-35: rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
T02D3757:108b-36: rgan mo des kyang 'chi khar gos de dag bu
T02D3757:108b-37: mo la gtad nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras
T02D3757:108b-38: so // de'i bu mo yang 'chi ba'i dus su
T02D3757:108b-39: gos de dag shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas de
T02D3757:108b-40: la gnas pa'i lha la khyod kyis gos 'di dag
T02D3757:108b-41: zas gtsang gi sras la phul cig ces gsol ba
T02D3757:108b-42: so // btab bo // de nas lha des sangs
T02D3757:108b-43: rgyas kyi ched du byang chub sems dpa' la phul
T02D3757:108b-44: so // btab bo // lo // de nyid kyis
T02D3757:108b-45: bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
T02D3757:109a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mang po'i sngon du 'gro ba 'od srungs chen @109a * //
T02D3757:109a-1: po'i mchod rten ni snam sbyar gyis yongs su dkris te bzhugs so //
T02D3757:109a-2: 'od srungs chen po yang ri bya rkang can du
T02D3757:109a-3: snam sbyar gyis dkris te da ltar yang bzhugs so
T02D3757:109a-4: // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma pham
T02D3757:109a-5: pa sangs rgyas nas ri bya rkang can du 'khor
T02D3757:109a-6: bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug la ston par
T02D3757:109a-7: // mdzad do // de'i tshe ri bo yang rang nyid kyis kha bye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3757:109a-8: bcom ldan 'das byams pa yang gnas brtan 'od srungs
T02D3757:109a-9: chen po rang gi lag pas blangs nas thams cad
T02D3757:109a-11: sh'akya thub pa'i nyan thos 'od srungs chen po sbyangs
T02D3757:109a-12: pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa cho 'phrul can mthong
T02D3757:109a-13: nas de thams cad kyis grangs ji lta bar 'bras
T02D3757:109a-15: de dag ni ma pham pa'i 'dus pa dang po
T02D3757:109a-16: la 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba
T02D3757:109a-17: ni gtam mo // brgya byin gyi mtsho'i lhor rdzing
T02D3757:109a-18: lag pas brkos pa'i gnas su aardzu na'i shing yod
T02D3757:109a-19: ni gtam mo // do // bcom ldan 'das khrus mdzad nas ta ma la'i steng du bzhengs so //
T02D3757:109a-20: sangs rgyas kyi rdzing gi lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das kyi chang bu'o //
T02D3757:109a-21: klu dus can gyi gnas pa ta'i shing drung du lteng rgyas 'od srungs la sogs pa gnas so //
T02D3757:109a-22: de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srungs 'khor
T02D3757:109a-23: lnga brgya dang bcas pa mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D3757:109a-24: la bkod do // de'i byang du mtshan mo me'i khang pa 'dul bar mdzad do //
T02D3757:109a-25: dge sbyong zhes pa ni yang dang yang du 'khor ba ste 'od srungs kyi tshogs rnams so //
T02D3757:109a-26: der mchod rten rnams kyi phreng ba'o //
T02D3757:109a-27: de'i byang du tshogs pa can gyi steng du bcom
T02D3757:109a-28: ldan 'das dang 'od srungs kyis dang por mthong ba'i
T02D3757:109a-30: de'i byang du bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa
T02D3757:109a-31: lhung bzed du bcug nas 'od srungs la bstan to
T02D3757:109a-32: // de'i lho byang du mchod rten gnyis so //
T02D3757:109a-33: gzims pa'i mchod rten gyi nub tu da ltar yang gser gyi stegs yod do //
T02D3757:109a-34: de la phur bu'i sa gzhi la sangs rgyas stong
T02D3757:109a-35: po gser gyi padma'i steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T02D3757:109a-36: // de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D3757:109a-37: 'khor ba 'jig la sogs pa bzhi byung bar gyur
T02D3757:109a-38: nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
T02D3757:109a-39: ma pham pa ni lnga pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02D3757:109b-0: de'i yang nub tu me'i khang pa 'dul ba'i @109b mchod rten no //
T02D3757:109b-1: de'i nub tu soo wa rtta'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:109b-2: de'i nub tu rma bya'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:109b-3: de'i byang du bum pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:109b-4: ma ti'i gtsug lag khang gi nub sde can gyi
T02D3757:109b-5: gnas kyi shar du sangs rgyas 'od srungs la sogs
T02D3757:109b-6: pa ste gnas su gshegs pa'i mchod rten no //
T02D3757:109b-7: de nyid du bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs
T02D3757:109b-8: kyi don du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i mchod rten
T02D3757:109b-9: gnyis so // ma ti'i gtsug lag khang dang nye
T02D3757:109b-10: bar 'od srungs kyi slob ma dang lhan cig tu
T02D3757:109b-12: 'od srungs kyi slob ma rnams kyi mchod rten ni zlum po ste chung ngu'o //
T02D3757:109b-13: gtsug lag khang gi byang shar du 'od srungs la
T02D3757:109b-14: sogs pa ral pa can rnams kyi mchod rten rnams
T02D3757:109b-15: so // 'od srungs la sogs pa ral pa can
T02D3757:109b-16: rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la dbyu gu dang sreg
T02D3757:109b-17: blugs la sogs pa phul lo //
T02D3757:109b-18: gtsug lag khang gi byang du mchod rten zlum po'o //
T02D3757:109b-19: der 'od srungs rab tu byung ngo zhes gtam du byed do //
T02D3757:109b-20: dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten no //
T02D3757:109b-21: de'i byang du bha go'i gtsug lag khang gi lho
T02D3757:109b-22: ngos su dga' ma dang dga' stobs mas 'o thug
T02D3757:109b-23: sprang rtsi lta bu phul ba'i mchod rten rnams so
T02D3757:109b-24: // padma'i gtsug lag khang gi mdun du mchod rten
T02D3757:109b-25: zlum po ste dga' ma dang dga' stobs ma'i khang
T02D3757:109b-26: // pa'o ; / de nas shar du'o thug sbrang
T02D3757:109b-27: rtsi lta bu bsgrub pa'i mchod rten gyi phreng ba'o
T02D3757:109b-28: // pa'o ; // de nas byang du byang chub
T02D3757:109b-29: sems dpa' dang por zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam
T02D3757:109b-30: // pa'o ; // mo // seng ge'i sgo'i byang
T02D3757:109b-31: nas nee ranydza na'i nub kyi 'gram du kha ta
T02D3757:109b-32: kha ti k'a baddha lha dang lha ma yin gyi
T02D3757:109b-34: der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'o thug sbrang rtsi
T02D3757:109b-35: lta bu gsol nas gser gyi snod du byin gyis
T02D3757:109b-36: brlabs par mdzad de lho phyogs nas dor ro //
T02D3757:109b-37: mchod sdong gi mchod rten ni sangs rgyas 'od srungs
T02D3757:109b-38: kyi zhabs 'chags pa'i gnas su'o zhes gtam du byed
T02D3757:109b-39: do // de'i nub byang du mchod rten zlum po'o //
T02D3757:109b-40: de bas na bcom ldan 'das ni 'od srungs la
T02D3757:109b-41: sogs pa'i 'khor stong gis bskor te glang po che'i
T02D3757:109b-42: dbus su mchod sbyin gyi tshal du gshegs so //
T02D3757:109b-43: de'i nub byang du sde dpon gyi grong ngo //
T02D3757:109b-44: de'i byang du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku snang ba'i mchod rten gnyis so //
T02D3757:110a-0: de'i byang du sh'u tsi ra gnod sbyin gyi gnas na @110a * //
T02D3757:110a-1: mchod rten no zhes bya ba ni byang chub chen po'i gnas bstan pa'o //
T02D3757:110a-2: byang chub chen po mdor bstan pa rdzogs so /
T02D3757:110a-4: // / rnam pa thams cad pa'i spyan gyis sems can ma lus pa'i khams la gzigs te /
T02D3757:110a-5: phrin las kyi 'jug pa rgyun mi chad pa'i sprul
T02D3757:110a-6: pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes pa
T02D3757:110a-7: chos kyi rje rin po che zhva dmar cod pa
T02D3757:110a-8: na 'dzin pa bzhi pa'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02D3757:110a-9: rmad du byung ba'i bsod nams dang ye shes chan
T02D3757:110a-10: po'i dpung gis phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgya
T02D3757:110a-11: ; ba'i mi'i dbang po chos kyi rje spyan snga rin po che'i bka' stsal spyi bor bzung ste /
T02D3757:110a-12: k'i ratya nanta zhes ming du chags pas pho brang
T02D3757:110a-13: chen po sne'u gdong gi gtsug lag khang du rgya
T02D3757:110a-14: gar gyi dpe las bod kyi skad du bsgyur ba'o//
T02D3757:110a-16: byang chub chen po'i gnas thob 'gyur //
T02D3757:110a-17: ma bsgyur log par bsgyur mchis na //
T02D3757:110a-18: 'jig rten mig gyur rnams la bshags ;
T02D3757:110a-19: / lha dang tshangs pas mchod gyur cing //
T02D3757:110a-20: sems can kun la mchog brtse ba //
T02D3757:110a-21: chos kyi rgyal po mchog dam pa //
T02D3757:110a-22: byang chub chen po der phyag 'tshal //
T02D3757:110a-23: rgyar ni nyi shu'i khru dang ni //
T02D3757:110a-24: yal ga stong phrag lnga pa ste //
T02D3757:110a-25: rtsa ba nas ni rtse mo'i bar //
T02D3757:110a-27: rin chen myu gu sngon po dang //
T02D3757:110a-28: 'dab ma sa la rab gnas pa //
T02D3757:110a-30: bdud stobs bcom nas rgyal gyur pa //
T02D3757:110a-31: kun mkhyen ye shes cod pan can //
T02D3757:110a-32: byang chub mchog der phyag bgyi'o //
T02D3757:110a-33: tshigs bcad 'di thams cad shi ha la'i dge slong n'a ka tam gyis so //
